meta.hint: Use 'was' if the sentence is about one person, animal, place or thing. eg. Richard was funny. eg. It was brittle. eg. She was here.  Use 'were' if the sentence is about more than one person, animal, place or  thing. Also, use 'were' if the sentence is about you. eg. Jake and Ron were late. eg. We were behind you. eg. You were so nice.
